activities: Intralox is a global manufacturer specializing in modular plastic conveyor belts.  Intralox receives human resources data on employees and prospective employees from its subsidiaries and branch offices in EU countries.  Some of this HR data is prcessed and stored in the U.S.  Intralox may also receive personal information from customers and prospective customers in EU countries via its website.  This information may be processed and stored in the U.S.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Packaging Eqpt (other than food) - (PKG)Plastic Materials & Resin - (PMR)Food Processing & Packaging Eqpt - (FPP)
recoursemech:
For complaints regarding human resources data, the EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner can investigate unresolved complaints.  
For unresolved complaints involving customer or prospective customer personal data, Intralox will utilize the American Arbitration Association (AAA)'s dispute resolution mechanism, ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
